detail: Philia Felice (フィリア・フィリス Firia Firisu?, "Philia Philis") is one of the protagonists of Tales of Destiny, also appearing in its sequel as a supporting character. Philia is an apprentice priestess from Straylize Temple, although she is also interested in conducting research, fulfilling the scientist archetype of the story. She is kind, polite, and naive, possessing many qualities typical of a feminine woman. She specializes in offensive magic of all elements with the help of her Swordian Clemente.
